name: Project PEPpeR
description:
You are an experimental PEPpeR mech, sent to the Abandoned Planet to restore the local flora. The more you plant and harvest, the more powerful the PEPpeR will become. Switch between 3 different plant types to plant sprouts, fend off enemy robots, and explore new regions of the planet.

Plant Types

Sprout: A common, nutritious species. Harvesting them will increase your power.

Spiker: A dangerous species which shoots deadly seeds at nearby hostile organisms. Luckily, they are indifferent to you.

Vine: A strong, easy-to-climb species. Particularly useful for traversal because PEPpeR units aren't equipped with jump boosters.

Controls

Move: A, D

Switch planting mode: (1 = sprout, 2 = spiker, 3 = vine)

Fire a seed: aim with mouse and left click

Harvest a sprout:  Space

Climb: W, S
